author: adityapatwardhan
body:
The package build fails on BinSkim due to missing PDB for `mi.dll` which is pulled from Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure nuget package.

# Steps to reproduce

Schedule package build

# Expected behavior

Build completes 

# Actual behavior

Build fails

# Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```none

Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.2.1
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    6.2.1
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.18903
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0

```
title: BinSkim fails on package builds due to missing pdb for mi.dll
